title: NYC Landlord Compliance Sentinel
text:
NYC Housing Maintenance Code





Image description



The New York City Housing Maintenance Code (HMC) protects tenants’ rights, promotes public health, and ensures that all New Yorkers live in well-maintained homes. Understanding and complying with the HMC is essential for landlords, tenants, and housing advocates to uphold the quality of housing in the city.

title: NYC Landlord Compliance Sentinel
text:
Problem Statement
The NYAG actively works to combat harmful landlord practices, including tenant harassment, deed theft, bank fraud, and other violations impacting tenants and homeowners.
